H0.text: A divide separates one river system's basin from another river system's basin.

H1.text: A bend separates one river system's basin from another river system's basin.

H2.text: A divert separates one river system's basin from another river system's basin.

H3.text: A sink separates one river system's basin from another river system's basin.

A4.text: Drainage divide, the line that separates neighbouring drainage basins
